    finaliser~.
<<pre id="VALfinalise" class="ocsforge_color odocwiki_code"|<<span class="ocsforge_color_keyword"|val>> <<span class="odocwiki_name"|finalise>> <<span class="ocsforge_color_delimiter"|~:>> <<span class="odocwiki_type"|<<span class="ocsforge_color_delimiter"| ( >>'a <<span class="ocsforge_color_delimiter"| -> >> unit <<span class="ocsforge_color_uid"|Lwt>><<span class="ocsforge_color_delimiter"| . >><<span class="ocsforge_color_lid"|t>><<span class="ocsforge_color_delimiter"| ) >> <<span class="ocsforge_color_delimiter"| -> >> 'a <<span class="ocsforge_color_delimiter"| -> >> unit>>>><<div class="odocwiki_info"|<<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|finalise f x>> ensures <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|f x>> is evaluated after <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|x>> has been

      termination at the end of the program~.


      ~Note that <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|f x>> is not called at garbage collection time~, but
      later in the main loop~.
